heading: HCR0006
0: CONCURRENT RESOLUTION URGING THE BANGSAMORO TRANSITION AUTHORITY TO DESIGNATE  ITS REPRESENTATIVES TO THE PHILIPPINE CONGRESS-BANGSAMORO PARLIAMENT FORUM TO BE CREATED PURSUANT TO ARTICLE VI, SECTION 3 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11054, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ORGANIC LAW FOR THE BANGSAMORO AUTONOMOUS REGION IN MUSLIM MINDANAO" AND TO MEET WITH THE DELEGATES DESIGNATED BY THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES FOR THE PURPOSE
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-01-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HCR0006
FULL TITLE : CONCURRENT RESOLUTION URGING THE BANGSAMORO TRANSITION AUTHORITY TO DESIGNATE ITS REPRESENTATIVES TO THE PHILIPPINE CONGRESS-BANGSAMORO PARLIAMENT FORUM TO BE CREATED PURSUANT TO ARTICLE VI, SECTION 3 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11054, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ORGANIC LAW FOR THE BANGSAMORO AUTONOMOUS REGION IN MUSLIM MINDANAO" AND TO MEET WITH THE DELEGATES DESIGNATED BY THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES FOR THE PURPOSE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMUALDEZ, FERDINAND MARTIN G.
DATE FILED : 2020-01-22
COUNTERPART HOUSE BILL/CONCURRENT RESOLUTION: SCR0005
